backend/main.mo: Defines resident management types and comparers, integrating authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for many frontend files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Deployment and smoke‑test checklist for Version 89 with no code or feature changes allowed.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color systems and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app logic handling authentication, startup timeouts, early health checks, routing, and error states.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Provides a dialog form for adding an ADL record, capturing date, activity, assistance level, and staff notes before submitting via useAddAdlRecord.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Defines a dialog to record daily vital signs, converting date/time to nanoseconds and submitting vitals through useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Implements a dialog for logging medication administration, selecting active medications and submitting time, staff, and notes using useAddMarRecord.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Renders a form to add a new medication to a resident, including dosage, route, times, and physician lookup, submitted via useAddMedication.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Contains a large multi-section form for creating a new resident record, collecting personal details, physicians, insurance, contacts, and medications before submitting with useAddResident.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Provides a dialog form to create a weight entry for a resident, validating inputs and submitting via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Renders the app logo with configurable size and mode, falling back to text if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Displays a dialog for editing an existing medication, preloading fields and submitting changes through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Large dialog for editing resident information, prepopulating all fields and updating via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for initial user profile setup, capturing name, role, and employee ID, then saving through a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: File is empty or not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: Fullscreen error screen showing error details, diagnostics, and retry/logout actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags. Includes helper functions for creating AuthClient instances with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and other backend data, including startup-safe variants using resilient actors and timeout handling. Handles error normalization and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates a resilient backend actor with timeout, identity support, and optional admin initialization. Exposes actor state via a React Query hook with controlled retry and fetch behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables for light and dark themes, overrides for dialog components, and comprehensive print styles. Ensures consistent layout and appearance across themes and print outputs.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides utilities for wrapping promises with timeouts and normalizing backend errors, including detection of stopped canisters and non-fatal conditions. Used to improve reliability of actor initialization and requests.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-safe URLs for public assets by normalizing Vite's BASE_URL and preventing double slashes.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Implements date conversion utilities between YYYY-MM-DD strings and nanoseconds, plus formatting and age calculation without timezone offset issues.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Provides backend diagnostics extraction from environment and performs a timeout‑protected health check call.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines centralized timeout constants used during frontend startup operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main resident dashboard with filtering, sorting, and resident management actions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity with a styled card and background.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Displays detailed resident information, medical records, and editing dialogs based on a route ID.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters via query strings or hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, extended shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and feature requests focused on improving startup fallback behavior when the backend is slow but reachable.
